Dejumo Lewis (amụrụ n'afọ 1943) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nke a ma ama maka ọrụ ya dịka Kabiyesi n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ 'The Village Headmaster', ihe nkiri Naijiria kacha ogologo oge na-egosi na telivisọn nke gosipụtara na NTA site na 1968 ruo 1988 nke Justus Esiri na Femi Robinson.
